metadata.description: Israel R. Jatobá's Portfolio - Full Stack Developer

Home.heroSubtitle: Full Stack Developer focused on backend, clean architecture, and high-performance systems.
Home.aboutText1: I work mainly with Node.js, TypeScript, and backend architecture. My passion is building predictable, observable, and easy-to-maintain systems.
Home.aboutText2: I believe that quality code is not just about working, but about being sustainable in the long run. If you are looking for solid and well-structured solutions, we are on the same page.
Home.quote: If you need a workaround, I'm probably not the right person.
Home.contactSubtitle: I'm always open to new opportunities, collaborations, or just to chat about technology.
